ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 34.3 (29.9-39.4) mg/L 96 hr, wt 150 mg, flow-through bioassay, dissolved oxygen 7.4 (4.6-8.8) mg/L, water hardness 44.9 (42.4-46.6) mg/L as CaCO3, pH 6.9-7.7, alkalinity 42.9 (39.6-61.4) mg/L CaCO3, temp: 26.4 + or - 1.4 °C, Purity 97%

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, age 32 days) 36.2 mg/L/96 hr (confidence limit: 31.5-41.6 mg/L); flow through, 25.3 °C, pH 7.3, hardness 45.6 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 42.8 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 7.6 mg/L /97% purity/
